## alpacon agent upgrade

Upgrade server's agent(alpamon)

```
alpacon agent upgrade [SERVER NAME] [flags]
```

### Examples

```
alpacon agent upgrade myserver
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for upgrade
```
